name: Space Rocks 3D (itch)
description:
This was a university project and is the first game I made in JavaScript. It was made by myself.

The art work has been taken from tutorials and royalty free sites. The sound was made by myself using ACID music studio.

This is a very simple prototype and was used to learn different methods of coding and it is very much to demonstrate what I learned.

I'm not making any money from this game. It is purely to host my game and allow people to play some of my work.
